name: Time Walk §lLOCKED§r
description:
Exposure to The End gave you an ability to move freely though space and time. From others perspective, you appear to be moving much faster through the air than normal.
This is extremely tasking on the body. Using it too much is not advised.
In your current state, wings don't fit your body...

badges.text:
Unlocks on §l[Morphling V]§r.
Upgrades on §l[Morphling VI]§r.
